title: Farts in a Jar? (feat. Kevin Ryan & H. Foley)
description:
Kevin Ryan and H. Foley of the "Are You Garbage?" Podcast join The Bonfire as the gang dives into a reality show star's world of selling farts in a jar.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
